name: Supreme Duelist Stickman (itch)
description:
Supreme Duelist Stickman is a physics based stick fighting game .

Choose a weapon (Sword, Bow, Hammer, etc..) and fight against the AI or a friend. There are a lot of weapons, terrains and 3 modes(1 player, 2 player and survival).

Download Now For FREE !

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Neurononfire.SupremeDuelist
